column1: Baby Barnaby's////We went here for the first time yesterday. I won't lie
column2: the parking is tricky to find a place and we waited at least 40 minutes. The inside seats a max of 35 people. After the first bite
column3: I knew it was worth it! The service was excellent
column4: and the food was top notch. I had the green eggs
column6: chicken Apple sausage with freshly squeezed orange juice. When I say freshly squeezed
column7: I mean that I watched a juicing machine squish the oranges right before our glasses were poured. I would not recommend being in a hurry
column8: or coming with a large group. But worth the wait and I will be dreaming about our next visit!
